attributes.action: Bring back the death sentence for cold blooded murder, paedophiles and repeat rapists.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This country scrapped the death sentence completely due to innocent people being killed. Why get rid of it completely, just change the rules. Do as america and keep people on a death row to allow any further evidence to be found. our prisons are overcrowded. bring back the death sentence and clear out all the lifers and stop wasting our taxes keeping such monsters in comfortable accomodation for life.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
